name: Snake Charmer
description:
You were minding your own business at the zoo, leaning on the railing at the anaconda exhibit when all of a sudden, the railing snaps and you fall in! Pickup and place food to attract and ultimately trick the snake into biting its own tail!

Play as a guy that is trapped in the snake pit and drop obstacles and food to maneuver and ultimately trap the snake. See how long you can last!

Controls (version 0.3)

WASD - move

Q - place food

E - place bombs(not actually working in jam submission)
